text: Baroi rasidan ʙa ʙaxsoisi Parvardigoraton va ʙihiste, ki pahnoi on monandi pahnoi osmonhovu zamin ast, ʙar jakdigar pesi gired (musoʙiqa). In ʙihist ʙaroi kasone, ki ʙa Xudovu pajomʙaronas imon ovardaand, muhajjo sudaast. In ʙaxsoisest az coniʙi Xudo, ki ʙa har ki mexohad, onro ato mekunad, va Xudo sohiʙi ʙaxsoise ʙuzurg ast
